messages.title: Why is UKIP backing Labour's Kate Hoey in Vauxhall?
messages.content: UKIP Leader Paul Nuttall on Daily Politics: “We (UKIP) are telling people in seats like Kate Hoey’s to go out and vote Labour. These are people who are true and real Brexiteers.”

issues.brexitEurope: Voted with UKIP 19 times on Article 50.

housing.content: Is it because UKIP say she gave 'assurances' to UKIP members in Lambeth that she would continue to fight for them if elected as your MP?

images.caption: Hoey Out! In Vauxhall, Vote Labour Get UKIP

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet appears to be critical of Kate Hoey for having similar voting patterns to UKIP on Brexit, and points out a donation made to UKIP. It also mentions her alleged support for fox hunting and the potential appeal she has to UKIP members due to these stances.
